name: NegotiableNetworkComponent
description: Represents the input to the negotiation process for a single network payload type.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The field for the id record component.

fields.name: version
fields.description: The field for the version record component.

fields.name: flow
fields.description: The field for the flow record component.

fields.name: optional
fields.description: The field for the optional record component.

constructors.name: NegotiableNetworkComponent
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a NegotiableNetworkComponent record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: id
methods.description: Returns the value of the id record component.

methods.name: version
methods.description: Returns the value of the version record component.

methods.name: flow
methods.description: Returns the value of the flow record component.

methods.name: optional
methods.description: Returns the value of the optional record component.
